Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Dumps \Dumps\ (d[u^]mps), n. pl. a gloomy mental state; same as 2nd {dump[1]}; -- used mostly in the phrase ``in the dumps''. [PJC]
dumps n : an informal expression for a mildly depressed state; "in the dumps"; "have the mopes" [syn: {mopes}]
